fact_check_explanation_title: 421 officials wrongly given early access to trade figures
fact_check_explanation_summary: Some government officials - including Ministers - are routinely given early access to certain official figures. People with 'pre-release access' must not — by law — disclose either the numbers …

fact_check_explanation_summary: This graph is a favourite of the Department for Work and Pensions, and routinely takes the top spot on the department's own website when employment figures come out: It's perfectly …

fact_check_explanation_title: £160m cost of missed GP appointments still not verified
fact_check_explanation_summary: The Daily Mail reported that missed GP appointments cost the NHS £160m a year. The only source we can find for this figure is a decade old.

fact_check_explanation_title: How overcrowded are prisons in England and Wales?
fact_check_explanation_summary: As the Chief Inspector of prisons criticises the current lack of resources in the Prison Service, we take a look at the numbers behind the story.

fact_check_explanation_title: Do missed GP appointments cost the NHS £160m per year?
fact_check_explanation_summary: Comments by the Health Secretary have sparked a debate about charging patients for doctors' appointments. But how common are missed slots, and how much do they cost the health service?

fact_check_explanation_title: If a house costs ten times your salary it doesn't necessarily mean you can't afford it

fact_check_explanation_title: Not all NHS international visitors are health tourists
fact_check_explanation_summary: We factchecked whether migrants will now be paying for the NHS.

fact_check_explanation_title: Is the Coalition spending more than ever before on flood defences?
fact_check_explanation_summary: After MPs expressed "concern" about the amount of money set aside for protecting the countryside from floods, Environment Minister Dan Rogerson defended the government's record.

fact_check_explanation_title: Report doesn't say liberal politicians caused hostility to migrants
fact_check_explanation_summary: The Telegraph have claimed that a new report by NatCen blames anti-immigration sentiment on liberal elites. But that's not what the report says.
